remarks.format: ## Remarks 从此函数返回的所有内存都必须为非托管内存或固定托管内存，或已使用 API 分配 。All memory returned from this function must either be unmanaged memory or pinned managed memory, or have been allocated with the API. 如果无法创建接口项并且返回了负数 `count` 或 `null` 和非零 `count` ，则对的调用 将引发 。If the interface entries cannot be created and a negative `count` or `null` and a non-zero `count` are returned, the call to will throw a .
